title: LOL client freeze whole PC
body: Hi guys I have a problem with instaling LoL. When I start my client, the game starts dowloading and than after a while (it depends, sometimes 20% sometimes 60% and last try 79%), internet stop working and after like 5s whole PC freeze. I have to push power button and turn whole PC off. I have no idea what to do with it, please help me.

replies.body: I'd look over some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure you can keep a solid connection throughout the whole download process. Also, just to cover the rest of the basics, go ahead and run through this [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to make sure the installer can access the files it needs to.
